Text: Hey Auge how about the harder to find Naked City from the same director/producer ?

I have not seen this one, since i've never been a Jules Dassin fan, but looks like that's about to change! Can't wait to watch that sexy Gene Tierney, even tho i understand she didn't get much screentime in this one. 
In any case, thanx again!
Hi Auge, can you upload the Criterion edition of Paris, Texas by Wim Wenders (if your disc has the commentary and extras)?

this is the second richard widmark that I watched. thanks auge!
